channel.title: [RELEASE] ShadowX V3 [UPDATED]
channel.description:
[center] [size=14pt]Full Release of ShadowX V3[/size]
I don't know much about this Server. I do know 2 people paid the Server's creator $50 for the files, I have asked the permission of both of them before releasing the Server.
[u]Download Contains: Server Source Files, Client Files, Cache[/u]
[b]Password for the .RAR is Stewie[/b] [code]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/6045/a2465d76e7374d91b8b5a62.png[/code]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?q96k9zkhn8sv8ie][img]http://www.curveexpert.net/main/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/download_button.png[/img][/url]
[hr]
[size=14pt]MEDIA[/size] [/center]
Home (Spawn) [img]http://i.imgur.com/M7HTP.jpg[/img]
Player Owned Shops [img]http://i.imgur.com/qFaTT.jpg[/img]

item.title: [RELEASE] ShadowX V3 [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @Java69 Java69
item.description:
@Java69 wrote:

[quote=“g0d of war1, post:76, topic:426696”][quote author=tinyscape link=topic=529393.msg3863816#msg3863816 date=1324839937]

[quote author=RevilXtreme link=topic=529393.msg3863538#msg3863538 date=1324810521]

0% TorvaPkz < TorvaPkz is a leeched ErasedPkz…
75% ErasedPkz as i used their base.
10% Hybrid Pvp since the guy that released ErasedPkz used the original Hybrid PvP client
10% Rune-Server certain tutorials.
5% Me as i didn’t work to my full potential on this client/server.

Moved onto a new project: http://google.com/runescape-development/google/projects/352341-project-incomprehensiblequality.html
[/quote]No, just no. Fuck off and Suck a tit. Torvapkz isn’t leeched, your fucking mum is leeched. NOW FUCK OFF!
[/quote] oh my dkm tiny you make me laugh so much[/quote]Too bad he’s banned…

item.title: [RELEASE] ShadowX V3 [UPDATED]
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:63, topic:426696”][quote author=RevilXtreme link=topic=529393.msg3863901#msg3863901 date=1324847794]

Only thing I like is the hunter. Good job.

None of the skills are 100% percent, never wrote them, they all are originally by sanity, i guess that random Hunter for just catching implings was in Hybrid PvP? Thats not even 2% of hunter, rewrote hunter almost 60% as on runescape on my current server. Anyways this user does not have my permisisosn to release this. Can a mod remove it?

Get my facts right? Fuck off.

Having a little reputation on a forum filled with idiots that think they’re “pro” doesn’t mean shit. Don’t post on a thread if yu have know knowledge about it.
[/quote]

@revil: gtfo, you are a fucking tard, you leeched hybrid pvp and sold it for $50 to a person, clearly you scammed this guy. He also doesn’t need any permission to have bought something from you, on a technicality you sold him ownership to this source. So get the hell out.

@stewie: report this to a mod that he sold you a leeched source without you knowing it. Revil will be banned for scamming and if you bought it via paypal, you can get a refund.[/quote]

I did not buy the source from him. One of the people who Revil sold the source to gave it to me so I could release it. I asked all of the people who bought the source to make sure they would be okay with me releasing something they paid for.

Read full topic
